vegetables.name: Carrot
vegetables.growing_tips: Plant carrots in loose, well-drained soil. Keep them consistently watered and thin out seedlings to allow room for roots to develop.

vegetables.name: Tomato
vegetables.growing_tips: Tomatoes need lots of sunlight and well-draining soil. Provide support for the plants as they grow and water consistently.

vegetables.name: Spinach
vegetables.growing_tips: Grow spinach in cool weather. Keep the soil consistently moist and harvest outer leaves regularly to encourage continuous growth.

vegetables.name: Broccoli
vegetables.growing_tips: Plant broccoli in fertile, well-drained soil. Provide consistent moisture and protect from extreme heat. Harvest before flowers bloom.

vegetables.name: Bell Pepper
vegetables.growing_tips: Plant peppers in warm soil with good drainage. Provide support for the plants as they grow and keep the soil consistently moist.

vegetables.name: Cucumber
vegetables.growing_tips: Cucumbers need warm soil and plenty of sunlight. Provide trellises for support and keep the soil consistently moist.

vegetables.name: Potato
vegetables.growing_tips: Plant potatoes in well-drained, loose soil. Hill up soil around the plants as they grow to prevent greening and protect tubers from sunlight.

vegetables.name: Beetroot
vegetables.growing_tips: Beetroots prefer loose, well-drained soil. Thin seedlings and keep consistently watered for tender roots.

vegetables.name: Onion
vegetables.growing_tips: Plant onions in fertile, well-drained soil. Keep them weed-free and water regularly. Harvest when the tops yellow and fall over.

vegetables.name: Lettuce
vegetables.growing_tips: Lettuce prefers cooler temperatures. Plant in loose, well-drained soil and provide consistent moisture. Harvest outer leaves for continuous growth.

fruits.name: Apple
fruits.growing_tips: Plant apple trees in well-drained soil and ensure adequate sunlight. Prune regularly and provide proper spacing for healthy growth.

fruits.name: Banana
fruits.growing_tips: Banana plants thrive in warm, humid conditions. Ensure regular watering and protect from strong winds.

fruits.name: Orange
fruits.growing_tips: Plant orange trees in well-draining soil, preferably in a sunny location. Protect young trees from frost.

fruits.name: Grapes
fruits.growing_tips: Grapes grow best in well-draining soil with plenty of sunlight. Prune regularly for better fruit production.

fruits.name: Strawberry
fruits.growing_tips: Plant strawberries in fertile, well-draining soil. Provide adequate water and sunlight, and protect from pests.

fruits.name: Pineapple
fruits.growing_tips: Pineapples prefer tropical conditions. They need well-drained soil and plenty of sun. Mulch around the plants to retain moisture.

fruits.name: Mango
fruits.growing_tips: Mango trees require warm temperatures and well-drained soil. Prune after fruiting to maintain tree health.

fruits.name: Watermelon
fruits.growing_tips: Watermelons need warm temperatures and a lot of space. Ensure regular watering and well-draining soil.

fruits.name: Blueberry
fruits.growing_tips: Blueberries thrive in acidic soil with good drainage. Prune in late winter for better growth.

fruits.name: Peach
fruits.growing_tips: Peach trees need well-drained soil and full sun. Prune in late winter to encourage new growth.
